creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation
description: eight horizontal rows of various square and rectangular banners, helmets, bundles, lanterns, streamers, and other military regalia on poles; predominately red, black , and white, with touches of turquoise and gold; white rectangular banner in URC; red rectangular banner with black and white striped small streamer at top in LRC
medium: Ink and color on paper; folding screen
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair
title: Battle Standards and Banners [right of a pair]
